project_name: AI-Powered Stock Market Prediction & Portfolio Risk Advisory System

core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Bloomberg Terminal meets Cyberpunk HUD.
Data is Art: Charts are not just functional; they are the primary aesthetic.
Darkness is Canvas: Use deep obsidian backgrounds to make neon data pop.
Density with Breath: High information density (like a pro tool) but with distinct grouping.
anti_patterns: No soft, muddy shadows. Use sharp, glowing borders.
No generic 'Inter' for headings. Use characterful fonts.
No gradients on text unless it's a massive hero title.

typography.installation_instructions: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Chivo:wght@300;400;700;900&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Manrope:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap');

usage_rules.headings: Uppercase, tracking-tight, weight 700 or 900. Use for page titles and major section headers.
usage_rules.body: High legibility, weight 400 or 500. Use for all standard text.
usage_rules.mono: Use for ALL numbers, tickers (e.g., RELIANCE, TCS), and financial data.

layout.spacing_system: Tailwind scale. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-4 for dense grids, Gap-8 for marketing sections.

grid_system.dashboard: Bento Grid Mode B (High Density). Grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4. Use col-span-2 for main charts.
grid_system.landing: Asymmetric Tetris Grid. Mix wide hero sections with narrow feature columns.

container_styles.card: bg-card border border-border rounded-sm hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-wider hover:shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(0,240,255,0.5)] transition-all rounded-sm

inputs.style: bg-input border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-sm text-white placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

charts.style: Use 'monotone' curves. Hide grid lines or make them extremely subtle (#222). Use gradients for area fills.

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use framer-motion to animate a glowing border around active cards.
visual_enhancers.scanlines: Optional subtle CRT scanline overlay on specific 'Terminal' sections.

assets.icons: Lucide React (default). Use stroke-width={1.5} for a sleek look.

hero_bg.usage: Landing page hero background with heavy dark overlay (bg-black/80).

transitions.page: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}

accessibility.contrast: Ensure neon text is not used on light backgrounds. Use white text on black backgrounds for body copy.
accessibility.testing: All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALLATION: Run 'npm install framer-motion @studio-freight/lenis recharts lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge'.
2. TAILWIND CONFIG: Update tailwind.config.js to use the specific colors defined in 'colors.palette'. Extend the theme, do not overwrite.
3. CSS VARIABLES: Update index.css :root and .dark classes to match the palette exactly. Force dark mode by default in body.
4. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
5. LANDING PAGE: The Login page IS the Landing page. It should have a split layout: Left side = 'Mumbai Skyline' with glass overlay and value prop; Right side = Login/Register form.
6. DASHBOARD: Use the 'Bento Grid' layout. Create a 'Ticker Tape' component at the top using a simple CSS animation.
7. CHARTS: Create a reusable <ChartCard> component that accepts a title, value, and Recharts component. Add a 'glow' effect to the line charts using drop-shadow filter in SVG.
8. TESTING: Add data-testid to every button, input, and link.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
